app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2304-8158/10/2/427/s1, Table S1: Correlation between antioxidants content (total polyphenols and ascorbic acid content) in leaves of five Brassicaceae species ( B. oleracea, R. raphanistrum, B. juncea, E. vesicaria, N. officinale) microgreens and their radical scavenger activity (DPPH assay, IC50).
